name: She Already Decided: Game
description:
(NOTE: Support the Official Mixtape Release on  smitransfer.com)

This is an art game dedicated to Smino's mixtape "She Already Decided."

It's a remodeled snake game cuz we're responsible for our own stress.  So
don't stress what you can't control".. This mixtape will help relieve you tho :)

Use WASD to Move or if ya not a gamer, the Arrow Keys are just fine too
